ch.nolix.core.endPoint5

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.ClosableElement
      • ch.nolix.core.endPoint5.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clearable<Server>, Closable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetServer

    public class Server
extends ClosableElement
implements Clearable<Server>
    A server manages duplex controller taker. A server is clearable and closable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Method Detail

      • addArbitraryDuplexControllerTaker

        public void addArbitraryDuplexControllerTaker(IEndPointTaker arbitraryDuplexControllerTaker)
        Adds the given arbitrary duplex controller taker to this server. An arbitrary duplex controller taker takes all duplex controllers without or with any target.
        Parameters:
        arbitraryDuplexControllerTaker -
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if this server contains duplex controller.

      • addDuplexControllerTaker

        public void addDuplexControllerTaker(IEndPointTaker endPointTaker)
        Adds the given duplex controller to this server.
        Parameters:
        endPointTaker -
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if this server contains a duplex controller with the same name the given duplex controller has

      • clear

        public final Server clear()
        Removes all duplex controller from this server.

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • hasArbitraryDuplexControllerTaker

        public boolean hasArbitraryDuplexControllerTaker()
        Returns:

      • isEmpty

        public final boolean isEmpty()
        Specified by:

        public void removeDuplexControllerTaker(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the duplex controller taker with the given name from this server.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if this server does not contain a duplex controller taker with the given name.

      • takeDuplexController

        public final void takeDuplexController(EndPoint endPoint)
        Lets this server take the given duplex controller.
        Parameters:
        endPoint -
        Throws:
        ArgumentMissesAttributeException - if this server does not have an arbitrary duplex controller taker or does not contain a duplex controller taker with the same name as the target of the given duplex controller.
